title: Vibrant Darwin Waterfront Escape near CBD
description: Set your sights on the Northern Territory and enjoy the wonders of the capital with a stylish stay at Vibe Hotel Darwin Waterfront. The location doesn't get better than this: you'll be perfectly placed in the heart of Darwin's exciting seafront promenade opposite the Darwin Waterfront Lagoon, and within easy reach of the CBD. Recharge after hours of exploring and plunge into the onsite pool, head to Curve Caf√© and Bar to sample innovative Australian cuisine or retreat to your stylish room.
offer_address: 7 Kitchener Dr, Darwin City NT 0800, Australia
